title: Wildside
description: Forget the lottery.Teenager Charlie Newell has just discovered something that will make him and his friends billionaires. What if a world existed in which no humans ever evolved? No cities. No pollution. No laws. A fantastic world filled with unimaginable riches in which everything— everything —was yours just for the taking?Charlie has found that world. And he plans to use it to make him and his friends rich.There is a How do you keep something this big a secret?
author: Steven Gould
